name: Folklore Silver Bird and Copper Tree Brooch
description:
A really unusual handmade silver bird and copper tree brooch.

This pretty brooch features a cute fine silver bird with a swirling wing and heart shaped tail. It sits on a copper tree with a swirling design.

This would make a super cute gift for women of any age. It has been oxidised and then polished which means it's folk-style features really stand out.

It is made from recycled fine silver and recycled copper which means it is a great eco friendly choice!

It fastens with a sterling silver brooch clasp which is securely soldered to the back of the brooch.

Dimensions:

The little bird measures 2cm x 1.5cm. 
The tree measures 5cm x 5 cm.

name: Folklore Silver and Gold Bird Tree Brooch
description:
A really unusual handmade silver and gold tree brooch.

This pretty brooch features a cute fine silver bird with a swirling wing and heart shaped tail. It has been oxidised and polished to give it a distinctive appearance. It sits on a pretty fine silver tree which has 24ct gold fused to some of it's branches and leaves.

This would make a great gift for women of any age.

It is made from recycled fine silver which means it is a great eco friendly choice!

It fastens with a sterling silver brooch clasp which is securely soldered to the back of the brooch.

Dimensions:

The little bird measures 2cm x 1.5cm. 
The tree measures 5cm x 5 cm.

This item is made to order and then Hallmarked by the Edinburgh Assay Office. Please allow two weeks from the point of order for me to ship the brooch.

name: Folklore Silver Bird Bangle
description:
Pretty silver bangle with a folklore inspired bird charm.

This pretty bangle is made from sterling silver with a hammered finish to add extra sparkle. The little silver bird charm measures 2cm x 1.5cm and is made from fine silver.

The bangle is available in 3 sizes (measured by diameter), please state which size you require upon order:

Small - 6cm (for seriously small hands and wrists!) 
Medium - 6.5cm 
Large - 7cm

Your bangle will be made to order, please allow 7 days for me to make it!

Hallmarked by the Assay Office of Edinburgh.

Your bangle will arrive in a pretty white box, tied with a blue ribbon - perfect for gift giving!

name: Folklore Silver Bird Earrings
description:
A really charming pair of little handmade silver bird earrings.

These pretty little earrings feature cute birds with swirling wings and heart shaped tails. They would make a super cute gift for women of any age. The little birds have been oxidised and then polished which means their folk-style features really stand out.

They are made from recycled fine silver which means they are a great eco friendly choice!

Available in your choice of sterling silver hoop or traditional hook style earring fittings.

Made from: 
Made from recycled fine silver and hung on a sterling silver earring fittings.

Dimensions: 
The little bird measures 2cm x 1.5cm.

The sterling silver hoops measure 1.2cm in diameter and the hooks measure 2cm in length.

name: Folklore Silver Bird Pendant
description:
A really charming little handmade silver bird pendant.

This pretty little necklace features a cute bird with a swirling wing and heart shaped tail. This would make a super cute gift for women of any age. It has been oxidised and then polished which means it's folk-style features really stand out.

It is made from recycled fine silver which means it is a great eco friendly choice!

Available in your choice of 16 inch or 18 inch sterling silver ball style chain.

Made from: 
Made from recycled fine silver and hung on a sterling silver chain.

Dimensions: 
The little bird measures 2cm x 1.5cm.

name: Silver Dandelion Wish Stud Earrings
description:
Tiny dandelion wish fine silver stud earrings. Inspired by nature and made from recycled silver these pretty little earrings make a great eco friendly choice! 

The dandelion wish is handrawn by me then transferred into the silver. The silver has been given a deep patina and then polished up to make the dandelion really stand out. 

They have post earring backs securely soldered to them.

All jewellery arrives in a pretty white box finished with a blue bow. I can add a personal message if you are buying the earrings as a gift.

name: Silver Dandelion Wish Round Pendant
description:
Small dandelion wish fine silver round necklace. 

The pendant measures 1.5cm in diameter and is hung on a 16 inch or 18 inch sterling silver bead style chain. The dandelion wish is handrawn by me then transferred into the silver. The silver has been given a deep patina and then polished up to make the dandelion really stand out. 

All jewellery arrives in a pretty white box finished with a blue bow. I can add a personal message if you are buying the necklace as a gift.

description:

name: Silver Leaf Ring
description:
A pretty sterling silver hammered ring with a fine silver leaf.

The sterling silver band is 2mm thick and has been hammered to give texture and additional shine.

The little leaf measures 0.8cm x 0.4cm.

I carefully handcraft each ring on order and tumble it to maximise strength and durability.

Please state your ring size upon order. Need help with sizing? Contact me for advice.

I will make and despatch your ring within 7 to 14 working days of receiving your order and payment.

All alibalijewellery arrives packaged in a pretty white gift box with a blue ribbon. The box is made from recycled materials. I will add a personal message at no extra charge. Please request stating desired message at point of order.

Handcrafted silver love bird with a leaf textured love heart wing.

He measures 3cm (1 1/4 inches) from beak to tail and 1cm across his tummy. 

He is hung from a 40cm or 45cm sterling silver ball chain.

He is made from recycled silver, making him a fantastic environmentally friendly choice!

All jewellery arrives packaged in a pretty white jewellery box with a blue ribbon. I will add a personal message at no extra charge. Please request stating desired message at point of order.

name: Silver and Gold Flower Love Bird Pendant
description:
I hand crafted this tiny little bird from fine silver and then gave him a beautiful little flower textured heart shaped wing!

He measures 3cm (1 1/4 inches) from beak to tail and 1cm across his tummy. His little wing is textured with a deep set flower texture and I have fused 24ct gold into one of the flowers.

He is hung from a 45cm (16 inch) sterling silver link chain, attached to it with a very plain petite sterling silver bail.

He is made from recycled silver, making him a fantastic environmentally friendly choice!

name: Silver and Gold Bird Flower Brooch
description:
I hand crafted this bird brooch from fine silver and then gave her a beautiful little floral textured silver and gold wing.

Bigger than my other tiny birds, she measures 3.5cm (1 1/2 inches) from beak to tail and 2cm across his tummy. Her wing has a floral texture which has 24ct gold fused to some of the flowers and then the remaining silver surface has been polished to a soft shine. The texture really stands out beautifully!

I have securely soldered a sturdy sterling silver pin style back to the little bird and it has a push on sterling silver catch.

She is made from recycled silver, making her a fantastic environmentally friendly choice.

All jewellery arrives packaged in a pretty white jewellery box with a blue ribbon. The box is made from recycled materials. I will add a personal message at no extra charge. Please request stating desired message at point of order.

name: Silver and Gold Flower Bird Pendant

Her wing has a deepset floral texture which has 24k gold fused to some of the flowers. The remaining surface of the bird has been polished to a soft sheen and the texture stands out beautifully.

Hung on a sterling silver link style chain with your choice of chain length.

This little bird measures 2cm across his tummy and 3.5cm from beak to tail.

He will arrive in a pretty white box, made from recyled materials and tied with a blue bow.

The earrings measure 1.4cm at their widest point and the total drop is 2.8cm.

All jewellery arrives in a pretty white box and tied with a blue ribbon, perfect for gift giving.

Hung on a sterling silver link style chain with your choice of chain length.

The earrings are made in two different sizes, 0.6cm diameter or 1cm diameter, please select your preference.

name: Silver and Gold Flower Ring
description:
Stunning fine silver and gold floral ring.

It has a floral texture with 24ct gold fused into some of the flowers.

Choose from two widths of ring, 0.5cm and 0.8cm. Please supply your ring size upon order. For the wider ring I recommend you go up one half size for a comfortable fit.

Every ring is individually handcrafted to order and therefore there may be small variations from the ring photographed, making every ring truly unique!

Hallmarked by the Edinburgh Assay Office.

All jewellery arrives in a pretty white box and tied with a blue ribbon, perfect for gift giving.

He is hung from a 40cm (16 inch) sterling silver ball chain

Made from eco friendly reclaimed silver.

They measure 0.5cm x 0.5cm.

name: Silver Fingerprint Round Cufflinks
description:
Round silver cufflinks with your loved ones fingerprint captured forever. I create beautiful personalised jewellery perfect for new daddies, grandpa's and boyfriends. Using your loved ones fingerprint makes each piece of jewellery completely unique and personal to you.

This listing is for one pair of round silver cufflinks with sterling silver t-bar style cufflink backs..

These cufflinks can be engraved on the back.

These items of jewellery are truly unique and it is really important to obtain a good fingerprint. This requires a special process, which you, the customer plays a very important part!

Here is a step by step guide to the process:

1. Order your jewellery.

2. I have two different ways of obtaining the fingerprints and you can choose which method you prefer. Both methods give exactly the same pretty indented fingerprint on the finished piece of jewellery.

Choose either:

Method 1: I dispatch a fingerprint kit within 24 hours of receiving your order, which contains a special putty to take the fingerprints. The kit contains full step by step instructions. You take the fingerprints and send them back to me. This method is particularly good for younger children. It captures even the finest details of the fingerprint.

Method 2: You take an ink fingerprint using a black inkpad available in stationery shops and then scan the fingerprint. You then email me a jpeg or pdf of the fingerprint. This method gives the same pretty result as the putty method but has the advantage of being quicker since we are not reliant on the postal service.

3. Tell me what engraving you wish on the front and or back of your jewellery and what stones/pearls you want if appropriate.

4.	Once I receive the fingerprints I will complete your piece of jewellery within 5 to 10 working days.

Please note: Baby's fingerprints are not fully formed until they reach 3 to 4 months of age, I therefore recommend you wait until your baby is at least 3 months old. I will keep the prints on file for 12 months in case you wish to order further jewellery.

This listing is for one dogtag personalised pendant with one fingerprint on a 24 inch stainless steel chain.

These fingerprint pendants can be engraved on the front and back.

These items of jewellery are truly unique and it is really important to obtain a good fingerprint. This requires a special process, which you, the customer plays a very important part!

Here is a step by step guide to the process:

1. Order your jewellery.

2. I have two different ways of obtaining the fingerprints and you can choose which method you prefer. Both methods give exactly the same pretty indented fingerprint on the finished piece of jewellery.

Choose either:

Method 1: I dispatch a fingerprint kit within 24 hours of receiving your order, which contains a special putty to take the fingerprints. The kit contains full step by step instructions. You take the fingerprints and send them back to me. This method is particularly good for younger children. It captures even the finest details of the fingerprint.

Method 2: You take an ink fingerprint using a black inkpad available in stationery shops and then scan the fingerprint. You then email me a jpeg or pdf of the fingerprint. This method gives the same pretty result as the putty method but has the advantage of being quicker since we are not reliant on the postal service.

3. Tell me what engraving you wish on the front and or back of your jewellery.

4. Once I receive the fingerprints I will complete your piece of jewellery within 5 to 10 working days.

Please note: Baby's fingerprints are not fully formed until they reach 3 to 4 months of age, I therefore recommend you wait until your baby is at least 3 months old. I will keep the prints on file for 12 months in case you wish to order further jewellery.

name: Silver Fingerprint Dogtag Necklace, Two Fingerprints
description:
A handmade fine silver dogtag necklace with your loved ones fingerprint or thumprint. Customized and engraved. 

This pendant is suitable for two fingerprints. Every one is handcrafted by me then oxidised and polished to ensure the fingerprint and message really stand out.

I can also engrave a name beside the fingerprint and a personal message on the back of the dog tag. The one shown is from a child to his daddy. Please state at the time of order what you wish engraved on the front and/or back.

Not exclusively for children's prints, these are popular with adult prints too. They make gorgeous gifts for grooms on their wedding day!!

The dog tag measures 3.2cm x 1.8cm and is hung on a 61cm (24 inch) stainless steel ball chain.

These items of jewellery are truly unique and it is really important to obtain a good fingerprint. This requires a special process, which you, the customer plays a very important part!

Here is a step by step guide to the process:

1. Order your jewellery.

2. I have two different ways of obtaining the fingerprints and you can choose which method you prefer. Both methods give exactly the same pretty indented fingerprint on the finished piece of jewellery.

Method 1: I dispatch a fingerprint kit within 24 hours of receiving your order, which contains a special putty to take the fingerprints. The kit contains full step by step instructions. You take the fingerprints and send them back to me. This method is particularly good for younger children. It captures even the finest details of the fingerprint.

Method 2: You take an ink fingerprint using a black inkpad available in stationery shops and then scan the fingerprint. You then email me a jpeg or pdf of the fingerprint. This method gives the same pretty result as the putty method but has the advantage of being quicker since we are not reliant on the postal service.

3. Tell me what engraving you wish on the front and or back of your jewellery.

4. Once I receive the fingerprints I will complete your piece of jewellery within 5 to 10 working days.

Please note: Baby's fingerprints are not fully formed until they reach 3 to 4 months of age, I therefore recommend you wait until your baby is at least 3 months old. I will keep the prints on file for 12 months in case you wish to order further jewellery.

name: Silver Snowflake Cufflinks
description:
Simply stunning silver snowflake cufflinks, a perfect gift for Christmas.

These striking silver cufflinks would be equally attractive on a woman's blouse as a man's shirt. The snowflake design makes them perfect to wear all winter and a wonderful gift for men or women this Christmas. The fronts of the cufflinks are made from reclaimed fine silver, making them a great eco friendly choice.

The cufflinks are available in two finishes; shiny silver or shiny silver with 24ct gold. Please state which finish you require when you place your order.

The cufflink fronts are made from reclaimed fine silver. The gold finish has 24ct gold fused to the surface of the cufflink. The cufflink backs are sturdy sterling silver t-bar style catches.

The cufflinks measure 1.4cm in diameter.

name: Small Silver Snowflake Pendant
description:
Pretty silver snowflake necklace, the perfect gift for Christmas, but lovely to wear all year round!

This pretty little pendant is made from fine silver and is available in two different finishes; shiny silver or hiny silver with 24ct gold fused to it's surface and hung on your choice of a 16 inch or 18 inch sterling silver link style chain. Please state which length of chain you prefer upon order. The pendant measures 1.5cm in diameter.

Your necklace will arrive in a white box tied with a pretty blue ribbon, perfect for gift giving.

I have matching earrings available in my shop.

name: Silver Snowflake Earrings
description:
Pretty little round silver snowflake earrings, a perfect Christmas gift!

These little earrings are made from fine silver, with sterling silver ear post and butterfly backs. They measure 0.9cm in diameter.

Available in two finishes; shiny silver or silver and gold.

I have a matching necklace available in my shop.

Your earrings will arrive in a little white box tied with a blue ribbon, ready for gift giving!

name: Silver Snowflake Pendant
description:
Pretty tiny silver snowflake necklace, the perfect gift for Christmas, but lovely to wear all year round!

This pretty little pendant is made from fine silver and is available in two finishes:  shiny silver or shiny silver and 24ct gold and is hung on your choice of a 16 inch or 18 inch sterling silver link style chain. Please state which length of chain you prefer upon order. The pendant measures 1.2m in diameter.

Your necklace will arrive in a white box tied with a pretty blue ribbon, perfect for gift giving.

I have matching earrings available in my shop.

name: Small Silver Snowflake Earrings
description:
Pretty little round silver snowflake earrings, a perfect Christmas gift!

These little earrings are made from fine silver, with sterling silver ear post and butterfly backs. They measure 0.9cm in diameter.

They are available in two different finishes; shiny silver or silver and gold.

name: Snowflakes Silver and Gold Ring
description:
A pretty sterling silver hammered ring with a 24ct gold and fine silver snow flake..

The sterling silver band is 2mm thick and has been hammered to give texture and additional shine.

The little snowflake measures 0.9cm in diameter..

I carefully handcraft each ring on order and tumble it to maximise strength and durability.

Please state your ring size upon order. Need help with sizing? Contact me for advice.

I will make and despatch your ring within 7 to 14 working days of receiving your order and payment.

All alibalijewellery arrives packaged in a pretty white gift box with a blue ribbon. The box is made from recycled materials. I will add a personal message at no extra charge. Please request stating desired message at point of order.
